entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
